item.description:
Welcome in the New World and the New You for a special gathering at A Higher Balance on Friday, 12/21/12!
    For this extraordinary date of cosmic significance, Judy will bring in sacred vibration with crystal bowl sound healing and psychic medium Helene Olsen (AngelsLighthouse.com) will offer her extraordinary ability to access and channel higher energy.
    Together, we will all participate in sacred ceremony and meditation, offering ourselves to help anchor Heaven on Earth. According to the Mayan prophesies, this cosmic alignment heralds a new Earth and a new humanity meant to awaken all to expanded, multidimensional awareness.
    In this gathering you will enter the sacred space lit with candles and streaming beautiful music to join us in a circle for ceremony, meditation, accessing higher energy, and receiving this new cosmic flow.
    The power of group energy will expand our Selves, our gifts and our hearts for the New World.

Walk-ins okay but your Meetup RSVP is helpful!

12/21/12 7:00-8:45 pm
$10 suggested donation for space rental
No registration required: just walk in!

See all programs at A Higher Balance at http://www.ahigherbalance.com/

group.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group

item.name: Sacred gathering for 12/21/12 at A Higher Balance
